text: Johannes Cornelius Bluming (6 February 1933 â€“ 17 December 2018) was a Dutch martial artist, instructor and actor. Bluming held 9th dan in judo, 10th dan in Kyokushin Karate and 10th dan in Hapkido. He was also the coach of two-time Olympic champion Willem Ruska. Bluming was born in Amsterdam. Bluming died on 17 December 2018 in De Bilt, Netherlands at the age of 85.Jon Bluming (1933 - 2018): vechtsporter die cultverschijning werd in Nederlandse films ==References== ==Other websites== * Jon Bluming official website * Autobiography Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch martial artists Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Actors from Amsterdam Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam
title: Jon Bluming
